#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,a,i,j,n;
    vector<int> arr;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {

     cin>>n;
     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {
         cin>>a;
         arr.push_back(a);
     }
     sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
     j=n-1;
     if(n%2==0)
     {
     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {
         if(i<=j)
         {
             cout<<arr[i]<<" "<<arr[j]<<" ";
             j--;
         }
         else
            break;
     }
        arr.clear();
        cout<<endl;
    }
    else
    {
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
         if(i<j)
         {
             cout<<arr[i]<<" "<<arr[j]<<" ";
             j--;
         }
         else
         {
             cout<<arr[j];
            break;
         }
        }
        arr.clear();
        cout<<endl;
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
